video.title: Love It or List It, Too
video.synopsis: When families outgrow or otherwise become discontented with their homes, a realtor and a designer help them decide: renovate or relocate?

episodes.synopsis: A frustrated couple with four daughters hates their disjointed floor plan. But can Jillian's fairy-tale redesign convince them to stay put?
episodes.title: Main Floor Malfunction

episodes.synopsis: This couple is more than ready to walk away from their never-ending renovation. But can they learn to love it again, or should they let Todd list it?
episodes.title: Disaster Renovation

episodes.synopsis: Neena and Jag desperately need an open floor plan to entertain their large extended family. But can Jillian deliver what they're looking for?
episodes.title: Too Close for Comfort

episodes.synopsis: Can a move-in ready beauty with a pool convince these fed-up homeowners to leave their perfect backyard (and not-so-perfect house)?
episodes.title: Pool Party

episodes.synopsis: Quick fixes weren't enough for this mountainside fixer-upper, and now they're living in a money pit. Can Jillian pull off a major makeover?
episodes.title: Money Pit

episodes.synopsis: They've lived in their home for 30 years, but now it might be time to move on. Can Todd convince them to hand over the keys?
episodes.title: Thirty-Year Throwdown

episodes.synopsis: A cabin in the woods was great -- until they started a family. Now, it's up to Jillian to transform this dysfunctional space into something divine.
episodes.title: Cabin in the Woods

episodes.synopsis: Todd tries to convince a family whose mountain home feels uncomfortably cramped to sell it -- and buy into an open concept.
episodes.title: On the Rocks

episodes.synopsis: While Jillian makes plans to put a modern twist on a 20-year-old floor plan, Todd tries to convince the owners to move into all-new digs.
episodes.title: Four's a Crowd

episodes.synopsis: Old houses have their charm, but this one lacks the space this growing family needs. Can Todd convince them to move into something more modern?
episodes.title: Cramped Quarters

episodes.synopsis: Jillian puts her design skills to the test to show a frustrated family that they're already living in the perfect home. It just needs a face-lift.
episodes.title: Disjointed Dwelling

episodes.synopsis: A couple whose daughter is in a wheelchair longs for more square footage. But would renovating their beachside rancher give them the space they need?
episodes.title: Bothersome Beachside Rancher

episodes.synopsis: A couple with kids can't decide whether it's time to sell their mountainside bungalow or make some changes to the existing structure.
episodes.title: Broken Up Bungalow
